notes: They will spawn at 4 points in the room during the phase when [[Sand Vortex|Sand Vortexes]] are active. They look the same as [[Larvae]] and can be [[Enraged Sand Brood|enraged]].
name: Sand Brood
strategy: Just kill these as fast as possible. Be careful when [[Sand Vortex]] are close by if doing area damage. 9 of these must be killed to make [[The Sandking]] reappear. It is recommended to push their corpses to the walls so [[The Sandking]] won't heal as easily.
